Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Porting Open XML SDK Library to Modern C++" (#817) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Is this a:
- [x] Question on library usage

**Description**
Is it any plan to port Open XML SDK Library to Modern C++?
Now C++ supports reflection and technically it is possible to port the library to the modern C++.

That will have significantly better performance and better portability.

Fixes #736 

Add Missing Enumeration value 'line'. Both files mentioned in #736 now validate without errors.
As this is my first PR, I am unsure if there is anything else I need to do in relation to this.
